mapper.sql: id as id, present_account_num as presentAccountNum, present_date as presentDate, consume_earnings as consumeEarnings, consume_earnings_max as consumeEarningsMax, consume_earnings_min as consumeEarningsMin, consume_level1_week_num as consumeLevel1WeekNum, consume_level2_week_num as consumeLevel2WeekNum, consume_level3_week_num as consumeLevel3WeekNum, consume_level4_week_num as consumeLevel4WeekNum, proceeds_earnings as proceedsEarnings, proceeds_earnings_max as proceedsEarningsMax, proceeds_earnings_min as proceedsEarningsMin, proceeds_level1_week_num as proceedsLevel1WeekNum, proceeds_level2_week_num as proceedsLevel2WeekNum, proceeds_level3_week_num as proceedsLevel3WeekNum, proceeds_level4_week_num as proceedsLevel4WeekNum, spread_earnings as spreadEarnings, spread_earnings_max as spreadEarningsMax, spread_earnings_min as spreadEarningsMin, spread_level1_week_num as spreadLevel1WeekNum, spread_level2_week_num as spreadLevel2WeekNum, spread_level3_week_num as spreadLevel3WeekNum, spread_level4_week_num as spreadLevel4WeekNum, payment_earnings as paymentEarnings, payment_earnings_max as paymentEarningsMax, payment_earnings_min as paymentEarningsMin, payment_level1_week_num as paymentLevel1WeekNum, payment_level2_week_num as paymentLevel2WeekNum, payment_level3_week_num as paymentLevel3WeekNum, payment_level4_week_num as paymentLevel4WeekNum, remain_level1_week_num as remainLevel1WeekNum, remain_level2_week_num as remainLevel2WeekNum, remain_level3_week_num as remainLevel3WeekNum, remain_level4_week_num as remainLevel4WeekNum, remain_earnings as remainEarnings, remain_earnings_max as remainEarningsMax, remain_earnings_min as remainEarningsMin
mapper.insert: insert into drt_monitor_points_day (id, present_account_num, present_date, consume_earnings, consume_earnings_max, consume_earnings_min, consume_level1_week_num, consume_level2_week_num, consume_level3_week_num, consume_level4_week_num, proceeds_earnings, proceeds_earnings_max, proceeds_earnings_min, proceeds_level1_week_num, proceeds_level2_week_num, proceeds_level3_week_num, proceeds_level4_week_num, spread_earnings, spread_earnings_max, spread_earnings_min, spread_level1_week_num, spread_level2_week_num, spread_level3_week_num, spread_level4_week_num, payment_earnings, payment_earnings_max, payment_earnings_min, payment_level1_week_num, payment_level2_week_num, payment_level3_week_num, payment_level4_week_num, remain_level1_week_num, remain_level2_week_num, remain_level3_week_num, remain_level4_week_num, remain_earnings, remain_earnings_max, remain_earnings_min) values (#{id}, #{presentAccountNum}, #{presentDate}, #{consumeEarnings}, #{consumeEarningsMax}, #{consumeEarningsMin}, #{consumeLevel1WeekNum}, #{consumeLevel2WeekNum}, #{consumeLevel3WeekNum}, #{consumeLevel4WeekNum}, #{proceedsEarnings}, #{proceedsEarningsMax}, #{proceedsEarningsMin}, #{proceedsLevel1WeekNum}, #{proceedsLevel2WeekNum}, #{proceedsLevel3WeekNum}, #{proceedsLevel4WeekNum}, #{spreadEarnings}, #{spreadEarningsMax}, #{spreadEarningsMin}, #{spreadLevel1WeekNum}, #{spreadLevel2WeekNum}, #{spreadLevel3WeekNum}, #{spreadLevel4WeekNum}, #{paymentEarnings}, #{paymentEarningsMax}, #{paymentEarningsMin}, #{paymentLevel1WeekNum}, #{paymentLevel2WeekNum}, #{paymentLevel3WeekNum}, #{paymentLevel4WeekNum}, #{remainLevel1WeekNum}, #{remainLevel2WeekNum}, #{remainLevel3WeekNum}, #{remainLevel4WeekNum}, #{remainEarnings}, #{remainEarningsMax}, #{remainEarningsMin})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_fin_all_earnings_record F WHERE F.FROM_TYPE= #{type} AND #{todayTime} > F.RECORD_TIME AND F.RECORD_TIME >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING 1000 > SUM(F.EARNINGS) AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_fin_all_earnings_record F WHERE F.FROM_TYPE= #{type} AND #{todayTime} > F.RECORD_TIME AND F.RECORD_TIME >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING 5000 > SUM(F.EARNINGS) AND SUM(F.EARNINGS) >= 1000 AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_fin_all_earnings_record F WHERE F.FROM_TYPE= #{type} AND #{todayTime} > F.RECORD_TIME AND F.RECORD_TIME >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING 10000 > SUM(F.EARNINGS) AND SUM(F.EARNINGS) >= 5000 AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_fin_all_earnings_record F WHERE F.FROM_TYPE= #{type} AND #{todayTime} > F.RECORD_TIME AND F.RECORD_TIME >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING SUM(F.EARNINGS) >= 10000 AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.order_earnings),F.account_id FROM drt_shop_order F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.create_time AND F.create_time >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.account_id HAVING 1000 > SUM(F.order_earnings) AND F.account_id IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.order_earnings),F.account_id FROM drt_shop_order F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.create_time AND F.create_time >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.account_id HAVING 5000 > SUM(F.order_earnings) AND SUM(F.order_earnings) >= 1000 AND F.account_id IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.order_earnings),F.account_id FROM drt_shop_order F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.create_time AND F.create_time >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.account_id HAVING 10000 > SUM(F.order_earnings) AND SUM(F.order_earnings) >= 5000 AND F.account_id IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.order_earnings),F.account_id FROM drt_shop_order F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.create_time AND F.create_time >= #{weekAgoTime} GROUP BY F.account_id HAVING SUM(F.order_earnings) >= 10000 AND F.account_id IS NOT NULL) p
SELECT MIN(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) earningsMin, MAX(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) earningsMax, SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) earningsSum FROM drt_account F

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_account F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.CREATE_TIME GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING 1000 > SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_account F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.CREATE_TIME GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING 5000 > SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) AND SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) >= 1000 AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_account F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.CREATE_TIME GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING 10000 > SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) AND SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) >= 5000 AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM(SELECT SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS),F.ACCOUNT_ID FROM drt_account F WHERE #{todayTime} > F.CREATE_TIME GROUP BY F.ACCOUNT_ID HAVING SUM(F.TOTAL_EARNINGS) >= 10000 AND F.ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL) p
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drt_monitor_points_day( id, present_date, present_account_num, consume_earnings, consume_earnings_max, consume_earnings_min, consume_level1_week_num, consume_level2_week_num, consume_level3_week_num, consume_level4_week_num, proceeds_earnings, proceeds_earnings_max, proceeds_earnings_min, proceeds_level1_week_num, proceeds_level2_week_num, proceeds_level3_week_num, proceeds_level4_week_num, spread_earnings, spread_earnings_max, spread_earnings_min, spread_level1_week_num, spread_level2_week_num, spread_level3_week_num, spread_level4_week_num, payment_earnings, payment_earnings_max, payment_earnings_min, payment_level1_week_num, payment_level2_week_num, payment_level3_week_num, payment_level4_week_num, remain_earnings, remain_earnings_max, remain_earnings_min, remain_level1_week_num, remain_level2_week_num, remain_level3_week_num, remain_level4_week_num ) VALUES( #{id}, #{presentDate}, #{presentAccountNum}, #{consumeEarnings}, #{consumeEarningsMax}, #{consumeEarningsMin}, #{consumeLevel1WeekNum}, #{consumeLevel2WeekNum}, #{consumeLevel3WeekNum}, #{consumeLevel4WeekNum}, #{proceedsEarnings}, #{proceedsEarningsMax}, #{proceedsEarningsMin}, #{proceedsLevel1WeekNum}, #{proceedsLevel2WeekNum}, #{proceedsLevel3WeekNum}, #{proceedsLevel4WeekNum}, #{spreadEarnings}, #{spreadEarningsMax}, #{spreadEarningsMin}, #{spreadLevel1WeekNum}, #{spreadLevel2WeekNum}, #{spreadLevel3WeekNum}, #{spreadLevel4WeekNum}, #{paymentEarnings}, #{paymentEarningsMax}, #{paymentEarningsMin}, #{paymentLevel1WeekNum}, #{paymentLevel2WeekNum}, #{paymentLevel3WeekNum}, #{paymentLevel4WeekNum}, #{remainEarnings}, #{remainEarningsMax}, #{remainEarningsMin}, #{remainLevel1WeekNum}, #{remainLevel2WeekNum}, #{remainLevel3WeekNum}, #{remainLevel4WeekNum})
